content: this bag is worked using medium worsted weight yarn and 4 mm crochet hook you ll need 1 ball 100 gm in main colour and less than half a ball in a complementing colour the bag is worked as a single rectangular piece which is folded into half and sewn at the sides and then the handles are worked video tutorial is available at https //youtu be/vjigzyaoi98 si=8buddv9jqdigipac
